main event: An unidentified object was spotted descending from the sky in Point Pleasant, New Jersey on September 10, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a house and changed shape during observation,The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes,The witness heard a voice telling her to say nothing about the sighting,There was a flattening of grass and wagon-like tracks found in the landing area after the object departed,The case remains unidentified despite efforts to classify it as a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
sighted object: large, shape-changing object, possibly resembling a big egg
witness description: a lady who was walking her dog and observed the object
